title: László Pusztai
text:
László Pusztai (1 March 1946 – 6 July 1987) was a Hungarian <a href="Association%20football">football</a> player who participated in the 1978 World Cup where <a href="Hungary%20national%20football%20team">Hungary</a> was eliminated in the first round.
After having spent numerous years in the Budapest clubs of <a href="Budapest%20Honv%C3%A9d%20FC">Budapest Honvéd FC</a> and <a href="Ferencv%C3%A1rosi%20TC">Ferencvárosi TC</a>, he went to Austria where he played for Eisenstadt for 3 years.
He was killed in a car accident, together with his wife, leaving two children behind.
